message: Let's be fair, Bob. I get a little more to start, and we can work from there.
I understand you wanting a head start Alice, but a 50/50 split seems fairest. This ensures we both benefit equally from reaching an agreement early.
Okay, Bob, I'm willing to come down a bit.  This is a chance to lock in a good deal before inflation eats more of our potential gains.
Alice, we're getting close. I've mirrored your previous offer to show I'm willing to negotiate. Let's settle this before inflation eats away any more.
